clues.text: Byzantine ruler Alexius IV Angelus was installed as emperor in 1203 by the fourth of these military expeditions

aka
the Stati Pontifici

This organization provides cards to help you use its roadside assistance program, which began as 5 motorcyclists in St. Louis

I may use a man's name in a man's world, but trust me ... I may be Victorian but I'm no run of "The Mill On The Floss"!

clues.text:
1993:
"All in all is all we are"

2021:
"You said forever, now I drive alone past your street"

1999:
"All that glitters is gold, only shootin' stars break the mold"

2002:
"I better have you naked by the end of this song"

1984:
"I am human & I need to be loved, just like everybody else does"

This region around the southern shores of San Francisco Bay stands in for the tech industry

The blade was originally wood or stone on this Native American hand hatchet; Europeans brought metal
